steps.title: Clean up redundant and temporary files:
steps.description:
- Delete `dist/`, `dev_server.log`, and `src/App.css`.
- Update `package.json` to change the project name to `cancunmueve`.

steps.title: Restore and Optimize Utilities:
steps.description:
- Re-implement `src/utils/db.ts` for IndexedDB caching (future-proofing offline-first).
- Re-implement `src/utils/geolocation.ts` for better GPS handling.

steps.title: Refactor App.tsx for Clarity:
steps.description:
- Move some inline styles or logic if it helps readability.
- Ensure environment variable usage is robust.

steps.title: Verify and Submit:
steps.description:
- Run a full build and tests.
- Final review of the codebase.
